      • BloomConfig

        public BloomConfig(int nbDocuments,
           int nbTerms,
           int nbHash,
           int bitsPerElement)
        Creates a new configuration object.
        Parameters:
        nbDocuments - Number of documents in the collection
        nbTerms - Number of unique terms in the collection
        nbHash - Number of Hash functions
        bitsPerElement - Number of bit positions per element
